titles.title: A bill to provide for the regulation of payment stablecoins, and for other purposes.
A bill to provide for the regulation of payment stablecoins, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
